summary: This bill, H.R. 3515, introduced in the House of Representatives by Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia, aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The primary objective is to exclude military bonuses from gross income, specifically bonuses paid to members of the uniformed services under chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code. This exclusion would apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
